subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Porto earned a 2-2 tie at Manchester United in the first leg of the European Champions League quarterfinals. United trailed for the first time in its title defense when Jonny Evans’s poor clearance led to Cristian Rodriguez’s fourth-minute goal. Wayne Rooney took advantage of a bad backpass from Bruno Alves to tie the score in the 15th. Carlos Tevez put Manchester United ahead in the 85th, but the Porto substitute Mariano Gonzalez beat goalkeeper Edwin van der Sar in the 89th.
